author: vmassol
msg: Fixed bug http://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=17012 (added support for JUnit ComparisonFailure)

author: vmassol
msg: build now correctly stops if a failure/error occurs during the tests

author: vmassol
msg: Added the "this." prefix to instance variables

author: vmassol
msg: best practice: renamed expected exceptions to "expected"

author: vmassol
msg: Fixed bug in Cactus exception handling where an invalid test result could result in a StringIndexOutOfBoundsException, thus hiding the real problem.
